attributes.action: To give Defence a separate section for petitions (separate from International Affairs)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: While much of defence does relate to the armed forces, it is absurd that petitions about the conditions of service of our armed forces might sit next to a petition for the saving of the lesser-spotted dingbat in some tiny island 10,000 miles from the UK.  There should be a separate section for petitions related to "Defence, HM Armed Forces, Veterans and Cadet Forces".  Our armed forces deserve nothing less.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
